featured.text: The hard hat was invented in 1919 by Edward W. Bullard, who had just returned from World War I. Before the war, workers used to smear their hats with coal tar for protection of their head.

definition.zh_def: 愛德華，一個常見的男性名字。
definition.en_def: Edward is a common male given name of English origin.
definition.example: Edward is planning to travel to Europe next summer.
